Dracon: Aries, don't mees this up.

No one else could have heard that. From that point on, Aries was in 
charge.

Chimera: What I can do... yes... Let me show you.

He transformed into a strange looking bot to say the least. The 
three heads formed a breastplate while a massive arm held a scaly 
whip. The other arm ended in the slim muzzle of a laser torch.

Chimera: I could show you what I can do, but I prefer to stay alive. 
After all, what's good in joining someone when that someone would 
prefer you dead?
